This document describes the current stable version of Celery (4.3). For development docs, go here.

celery.backends.asynchronous¶

Async I/O backend support utilities.

class celery.backends.asynchronous.AsyncBackendMixin[소스]¶

Mixin for backends that enables the async API.

Manager responsible for consuming result messages.
